entry.title: Seminar project, PA2
entry.summary:
Seminar project is mandatory in PA2. Three problem are offered from mid March, students are supposed to choose one topic.
The solution of the problem is a program in C++, the problem must be solves using OO techniques (encapsulation, inheritance, polymorphism). The expected extent of your seminar project is 1000-3000 source code lines.
